# caiporar

<!-- 
badges: start 
badges: end 
-->

The `caiporar` `R` package, written by [Roney Fraga Souza](http://roneyfraga.com), has general-purpose functions and was built to help friends.

## Installation

To install the released version:

```{r eval=F, include=T}
# install and load devtools from CRAN
install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)

# install and load caiporar
devtools::install_github("roneyfraga/caiporar")
library(caiporar)
```
